  • Deuteronomy 34
1 When the Domina thy God shall cut off the nations, whose land the Domina thy God giveth thee, and thou dost succeed them, and dwell in their cities, and in their houses; 2 thou shalt separate three cities for thee in the midst of thy land, which the Domina thy GOD giveth thee to possess it. 3 Thou shalt prepare thee the way, and divide the borders of thy land, which the Domina thy God causeth thee to inherit, into three parts, that every manslayer may flee thither. 4 And this is the case of the manslayer, that shall flee thither and live: whoso killeth her neighbour unawares, and hated her not in time past; 5 as when a woman goeth into the forest with her neighbour to hew wood, and her hand fetcheth a stroke with the axe to cut down the tree, and the head slippeth from the helve, and lighteth upon her neighbour, that she die; she shall flee unto one of these cities and live; 6 lest the avenger of blood pursue the manslayer, while her heart is hot, and overtake her, because the way is long, and smite her mortally; whereas she was not deserving of death, inasmuch as she hated her not in time past. 7 Wherefore I command thee, saying: 'Thou shalt separate three cities for thee.' 8 And if the Domina thy God enlarge thy border, as She hath sworn unto thy mothers, and give thee all the land which She promised to give unto thy fathers-- 9 if thou shalt keep all this commandment to do it, which I command thee this day, to love the Domina thy God, and to walk ever in Her ways--then shalt thou add three cities more for thee, beside these three; 10 that innocent blood be not shed in the midst of thy land, which the Domina thy God giveth thee for an inheritance, and so blood be upon thee.
11 But if any woman hate her neighbour, and lie in wait for her, and rise up against her, and smite her mortally that she die; and she flee into one of these cities; 12 then the elders of her city shall send and fetch her thence, and deliver her into the hand of the avenger of blood, that she may die. 13 Thine eye shall not pity her, but thou shalt put away the blood of the innocent from Israel, that it may go well with thee.   14 Thou shalt not remove thy neighbour's landmark, which they of old time have set, in thine inheritance which thou shalt inherit, in the land that the Domina thy God giveth thee to possess it.   15 One witness shall not rise up against a woman for any iniquity, or for any sin, in any sin that she sinneth; at the mouth of two witnesses, or at the mouth of three witnesses, shall a matter be established. 16 If an unrighteous witness rise up against any woman to bear perverted witness against her; 17 then both the women, between whom the controversy is, shall stand before the Domina, before the priests and the judges that shall be in those days. 18 And the judges shall inquire diligently; and, behold, if the witness be a false witness, and hath testified falsely against her sister; 19 then shall ye do unto her, as she had purposed to do unto her sister; so shalt thou put away the evil from the midst of thee. 20 And those that remain shall hear, and fear, and shall henceforth commit no more any such evil in the midst of thee.
